com.example.tlafranc.assignment1

Class SubscriptionWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.tlafranc.assignment1.SubscriptionWatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.text.NoCopySpan, android.text.TextWatcher

    public class SubscriptionWatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.text.TextWatcher
    Class made to determines if the entries in AddSubscriptionActivity or EditDeleteActivity are legal entries (legal entries are defined by the app requirements).

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.text.NoCopySpan

        android.text.NoCopySpan.Concrete

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SubscriptionWatcher(android.widget.EditText nameText, android.widget.EditText dateText, android.widget.EditText chargeText, android.widget.Button confirm)
      Initializes a SubscriptionWatcher object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void afterTextChanged(android.text.Editable editable)
      Function needs to be implemented in order to implement TextWatcher but is not used.
      void beforeTextChanged(java.lang.CharSequence charSequence, int i, int i1, int i2)
      Function needs to be implemented in order to implement TextWatcher but is not used.
      void checkFieldsForIllegalEntry()
      Function that determines if there are any blank fields for name, date and charge as these fields must be filled as specified by the requirements.
      void onTextChanged(java.lang.CharSequence charSequence, int i, int i1, int i2)
      Function that upon text changes makes a call to checkFieldsForIllegalEntry to determine if the changes made have fixed an illegal entry or created one.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SubscriptionWatcher

        public SubscriptionWatcher(android.widget.EditText nameText,
                           android.widget.EditText dateText,
                           android.widget.EditText chargeText,
                           android.widget.Button confirm)
        Initializes a SubscriptionWatcher object.
        Parameters:
        nameText - EditText object where the name of the subscription goes
        dateText - EditText object where the date of the subscription goes
        chargeText - EditText object where the charge of the subscription goes
        confirm - Button object that needs to be disabled if there are some illegal entries

      • checkFieldsForIllegalEntry

        public void checkFieldsForIllegalEntry()
        Function that determines if there are any blank fields for name, date and charge as these fields must be filled as specified by the requirements. Also checks to see if the date is of form YYYY-MM-DD
